results.query: How many vacation days do I have?

response.answer:
TechNova Vacation Policy:

• 0-2 years tenure: 15 days/year (1.25 days/month)
• 2-5 years: 20 days/year (1.67 days/month)
• 5+ years or manager level: 25 days/year (2.08 days/month)
• Tenure bonus: +1

2. Go to Pay > Direct Deposit
3. Enter bank routing number and account number
